title: Federal Judge Rejects Trump Request to Block Disclosure of Records to Jan. 6 Committee
sub_head: Judge cites public interest in studying assault on Capitol
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”A federal judge said records from the Trump White House can be turned over to the House committee investigating the Jan. 6 assault on the U.S. Capitol, rejecting a request by former President Donald Trump to block their disclosure.
U.S. District Judge Tanya Chutkan said late Tuesday that Congress should have access to the records.
